cards.title: We are Humans
cards.text: We act like humans, we talk like humans, and we think like humans. And we call out anyone who does the opposite.
cards.author: António Capelo

cards.title: We work together
cards.text: We insist on working collaborativelly. <bold>No rockstars</bold>. No departments. The whole owns the whole project together.
cards.author: José Tavares

cards.title: We change
cards.text: Nothing is sacred, from our habits to our rituals, to our enviroment. Change is a natural part of the human life, and we prefer to embrace it.
cards.author: Pedro Almeida

cards.title: Work Autonomously
cards.text: You’re given an incredible amount of freedom and autonomy at Mindera. That goes for everyone.
cards.author: Luís Couto

cards.title: Central Washington
cards.text: Steamboat Rock. Proceed through the entrance station, and begin looking for the day use parking area.
cards.author: Sunny Yuen

cards.title: Multi-Media Vacation
cards.text: Tour of a beautiful resort unit, Interactive map and videro of all resorts.
cards.author: Sunny Yuen

cards.title: This Is A Public Broadcast
cards.text: A few announcements to make today, there had been an incident across town of Hawakapica. People are seemingly disappearing.
cards.author: News Update DCNR
